name: ConGon
description:
A classic MotoGami from Dr Abstract to catch escaping cons! The spotlight gets smaller each con caught - an abstraction of time. The stereo clip clopping of the cons (Dr Abstract's tongue) helps the collector know which way the cons have fled! 

ConGon, made with ZIM at https://zimjs.com, is a modern-day remake of the 2004 MotoGami Flash game by Inventor Dan Zen. This mini-series also included ChooFu, InfiZoom and KiteKilt. Here is your opportunity to collect a memento of this proto-creative time in the now of NFT!

Dr Abstract is the Founder of ZIM and inaugural member of the Gadget Minters at https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters. To find out more about making interactive NFTs with ZIM please visit https://zimjs.com/nft
